Nov. 21, 2010 D West Midlands Brass Band Association Contest (1st Section)
West Midlands BBA Contest (First Section) 10 Own Choice Test Piece Contest West Midlands BBA Contest west-midlands-brassband-association-1st-section
Royal Spa Centre, Royal Leamington Spa, Warwickshire, England, UK BBC Radio Birmingham Trophy awarded to conductor of winning band : Rob Boulter, Oddfellows Brass
Nov. 23, 2010, 10:27 a.m. Oct. 11, 2013, 9:27 a.m.
1 Oddfellows Brass Robert Boulter Tallis Variations
2 Enderby Band Jonathan Mott The Land of the Long White Cloud - Aotearoa
